comment.author: Shane
comment.text: Darlow can can people vote for a person that should be in jail???

replies.author: Molly
replies.text: How can people vote for someone who disrespectful of women and thinks rape is ok? That would be Trump.

replies.author: Molly
replies.text: Love you Shane A Rupert but I will take Hillary over slimy Trump.

replies.author: Shane
replies.text: Well.. Its all opinions! Ive worked in a factory for 22 years and I handled myself quite well! People ( men and women talk like he did in 2003 everyday) To me its very minor! Im a strong woman its all an opinion. Now Hillary!! She let soldiers die on her clock! She wants to let everyone be a parasite off my dollar!! She has done nothing in 30 years! She left nafta happen!! Theres so much wrong that she has already done!! As far as im concerned with Trump talking about a woman is the same as what color curtain Hillary is wearing! I DONT CARE!!! Its petty crap!! I care about my country being safe and like Trump said Build a wall until we know who is coming in!!!
